name: Clowning Around! (lovesickcircus)
description:
This is a prototype for stories I would like to make in the future. Nothing serious - in fact, it's just the opposite! This is a silly game based a little bit around my own experiences, but mostly it's about being in your early twenties and your best friend wanting to go join the circus. Make a new friend, if you can, or maybe just try and have a great night with your bestie. 

There are two secret endings, both silly and fun, but giving a little lore on the characters. I hope you enjoy this game and perhaps I'll make a sequel, if people like it. Thank you!
